messages.title: It’s Martin Tod or the Conservatives
messages.content: Martin Tod leads the campaign to get Winchester City Council to halve its CO2 emissions by 10% in 2010.

messages.title: Martin Tod delivers for us
messages.content: Martin Tod has worked hard to get the best from local services and local people. He’s secured apprenticeships and training places for hundreds of people in Winchester.

messages.title: Standing up for people in Winchester & Chandler’s Ford
messages.content: I will put local people first. I will come to help, listen to your concerns and stand up for your community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Led the campaign to get Winchester City Council to commit to guarantees and cut its CO2 emissions by 10% in 2010.
Regularly visits schools across our area – helping solve problems and listening to students.
Martin Tod leads the campaign to get Winchester City Council to halve its CO2 emissions by 10% in 2010.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Our four steps to a fairer Britain
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and colleges. A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener. A fair deal for you from the politicians.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It’s a choice between Martin Tod or the Conservative.

issues.economy: Martin Tod has worked hard to get the best from local services and local people. He’s secured apprenticeships and training places for hundreds of people in Winchester.
issues.education: Martin regularly visits schools across our area – helping solve problems and listening to students. He has successfully helped parents with problems getting places for their children and involved hundreds more students and parents in campaigns about our exam system.
issues.environment: Martin Tod leads the campaign to get Winchester City Council to halve its CO2 emissions by 10% in 2010.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will put local people first. I will come to help, listen to your concerns and stand up for your community.

images.caption: Graph showing Lib Dems 51%, Con 39%, Lab 8%

leaflet.additionalNotes: More and more people are switching to back Liberal Democrats and Martin Tod because they know: every single vote for Martin Tod is a vote to protect our NHS and our frontline services.
